de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.winter.preprocessing.datatypes

Class DateJavaTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.winter.preprocessing.datatypes.DateJavaTime

  • public class DateJavaTime
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Alexander Brinkmann (albrinkm@mail.uni-mannheim.de) Based on de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.winter.preprocessing.datatypes.DateUtil, but uses java time to construct dates. Helps to parse a date based on all listed regex expressions.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DateJavaTime()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static java.lang.String determineDateFormat(java.lang.String dateString)
      Determine DateTimeFormatter pattern matching with the given date string.
      static java.time.LocalDateTime parse(java.lang.String dateString)
      Parse the given date string to date object and return a localDateTime instance based on the given date string.
      static java.time.LocalDateTime parse(java.lang.String dateString, java.lang.String dateFormat)
      Validate the actual date of the given date string based on the given date format pattern and return a date instance based on the given date string.

      • DateJavaTime

        public DateJavaTime()

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime parse(java.lang.String dateString)
                                     throws java.text.ParseException
        Parse the given date string to date object and return a localDateTime instance based on the given date string. This makes use of the determineDateFormat(String) to determine the DateTimeFormat pattern to be used for parsing.
        Parameters:
        dateString - The date string to be parsed to date object.
        Returns:
        The parsed localDateTime object.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - If the date format pattern of the given date string is unknown, or if the given date string or its actual date is invalid based on the date format pattern.

      • parse

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime parse(java.lang.String dateString,
                                            java.lang.String dateFormat)
                                     throws java.text.ParseException
        Validate the actual date of the given date string based on the given date format pattern and return a date instance based on the given date string.
        Parameters:
        dateString - The date string.
        dateFormat - The date format pattern which should respect the DateTimeFormatter rules.
        Returns:
        The parsed date object.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - If the given date string or its actual date is invalid based on the given date format pattern.
        See Also:
        SimpleDateFormat

      • determineDateFormat

        public static java.lang.String determineDateFormat(java.lang.String dateString)
        Determine DateTimeFormatter pattern matching with the given date string. Returns null if format is unknown. You can simply extend DateJavaTime with more formats if needed.
        Parameters:
        dateString - The date string to determine the DateTimeFormat pattern for.
        Returns:
        The matching SimpleDateFormat pattern, or null if format is unknown.
        See Also:
        SimpleDateFormat
